Package uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player

This is the main package for vlcj client applications, providing the classes necessary to create and control native media players and associated resources.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MediaMeta
    Specification for media meta data.
    MediaPlayer
    Specification for a media player component.
    MediaPlayerEventListener
    Specification for a component that is interested in receiving event notifications from the media player.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMediaPlayer
    Base implementation for media players sharing common behaviours.
    AudioDevice
    Description of an audio output device.
    AudioOutput
    Description of an audio output.
    AudioTrackInfo
    Audio track info.
    DefaultMediaPlayer
    Media player implementation.
    Logo
    Builder for a Logo.
    Marquee
    Builder for a Marquee.
    MediaDetails
    Media meta data.
    MediaPlayerEventAdapter
    Default implementation of the media player event listener.
    MediaPlayerFactory
    Factory for media player instances.
    MediaPlayerLatch
    This class implements a mechanism to play a media item and wait for it to start (or wait for it to raise an error instead of starting).
    ModuleDescription
    Description of a module (e.g.
    SpuTrackInfo  
    TrackDescription
    Description of a track, e.g.
    TrackInfo
    Base track info.
    UnknownTrackInfo  
    VideoOutputLatch Deprecated 
    VideoTrackInfo
    Video track info.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AudioOutputDeviceType
    Enumeration of audio output device types.
    DeinterlaceMode
    Enumeration of deinterlace modes.

Package uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player Description

This is the main package for vlcj client applications, providing the classes necessary to create and control native media players and associated resources.
